messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: It's come to my attention that several crew members have brain tumours, i have manntinol in the chem fridge to help these lot, also, suit sensors full please

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We out here on that space facism

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Yall stupid workers better not be doing Spess Facism over there, I'll be very dissapointed.
-Your Commander, Space Stalin

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Okay, so there is nobody settign up power, what i'm gonna do is backup call the shuttle incase the console goes down while we try to get somebody working to set it up
